title: Add a Table
objective: Learn how to define and access a table and its data.

exercise.instructions: 1. Add 'aux_source_directory(fsw/tables APP_TABLE_FILES)' so the table source file is included in the build.
1. Add 'add_cfe_tables(@template@ ${APP_TABLE_FILES})' so the table tool creation tool is invoked to create the .tbl file.

1. Locate the ExampleParamCmd definition in the '<DataTypeSet>' element. After this definiton, insert a new ExampleTable ContainerDataType definition as shown in the exercise window.

Note the GUI needs to be restarted after building the new lesson cFS target.
Note TODO explain why required.

1. Add macros that define the default table filename and cFE name
    @TEMPLATE@_TABLE_FILE "/cf/@template@_tbl.tbl"
    #define @TEMPLATE@_TBL_NAME   "@TEMPLATE@.ExampleTable"

Note see the block comment above the macros for limitations imposed by the CFE_TBL_FILEDEF() macro.
1. Add the @TEMPLATE@_Table_t definition from the exercise window.
1. Add the code from the exercise window that includes the default table values and an invocation of the CFE_TBL_FILEDEF() macro to supply information to the table creation tool.

1. At the end of the @template@ includes add
    #include "@template@_table.h"

1. Locate the @TEMPLATE@_Init() fucntion. At the end of the
function before the initialization complete event message, add the code from the exercise window.
1. Go to the end of the file and add the SendTblDataEvent() function from the exercise window.
